Acceptance rate & Admissions

Acceptance Rate40% Admissions RequirementsCompetitive admission

We've calculated the 40% acceptance rate for Oita University of Nursing and Health Sciences based on the ratio of admissions to applications and other circumstantial enrollment data. Treat this information as a rough guide and not as a definitive measure of your chances of admission. Different programs may have significantly varying admissions rates.

Research profile

Oita University of Nursing and Health Sciences has published 460 scientific papers with 7,287 citations received. The research profile covers a range of fields, including Medicine, Biology, Chemistry, Genetics, Liberal Arts & Social Sciences, Biochemistry, Pathology, Physics, Psychology, and Engineering.

Tuition

The tuition table for Oita University of Nursing and Health Sciences gives an overview of costs but prices are approximate and subject to change and don't include accommodation, textbooks, or living expenses. The costs of programs might differ significantly for local and international students. The only source of truth for current numbers is the university's official website.

Program Duration Tuition (JPY) Bachelor of Nursing 4 years 2,520,000 Bachelor of Physical Therapy 4 years 2,520,000 Bachelor of Occupational Therapy 4 years 2,520,000 Master of Nursing 2 years 1,620,000 Master of Physical Therapy 2 years 1,620,000 Master of Occupational Therapy 2 years 1,620,000 Doctor of Nursing 3 years 2,430,000 Doctor of Physical Therapy 3 years 2,430,000 Doctor of Occupational Therapy 3 years 2,430,000
